fixes.name: Año título (copia)
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR yearText = FORMAT('historicoEducacionCLEAN (historicoEducacionCLEAN)'[Año título], "0")
VAR yearNumber = IF(TRIM(yearText) = "", BLANK(), VALUE(yearText))
RETURN
IF(NOT(ISBLANK(yearNumber)), DATE(yearNumber, 1, 1), BLANK())
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the row-level Tableau parsing logic to a calculated column. DATEPARSE("yyyy", STR([Año título])) is mapped by extracting the numeric year from the field and building a date with DATE(year, 1, 1). ISNULL checks are represented with ISBLANK; STR is represented with FORMAT(..., "0"). The original alternate DATEPARSE("HH", ...) branch was not material because the source field is an integer year; this expression returns Jan 1 of the parsed year when present, otherwise BLANK().
